channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow

item.title: CVE-2021-39046|2024-08-04T01:58:17.584Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0, and 21.0 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a lprivileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 214346.

item.title: CVE-2021-38900|2024-08-04T01:51:20.879Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 and IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0 and 21.0 could allow a privileged user to obtain highly sensitive information due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 209607.

item.title: CVE-2020-4531|2024-08-04T08:07:48.922Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, and 20.0 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.0, 8.5, and 8.6 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 182715.

item.title: CVE-2020-4768|2024-08-04T08:14:59.005Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Case Manager 5.2 and 5.3 and IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, and 20.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 188907.

item.title: CVE-2020-4900|2024-08-04T08:14:59.168Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 19.0.0.3 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 190991.

item.title: CVE-2020-4672|2024-08-04T08:07:49.209Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 20.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186285.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T13:34:16.845Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T18:49:24.893Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.
